aboutPage.historyIntro: Founded in 2018, Digital Hub Agency was born with the purpose of democratizing access to quality digital solutions. We started as a small team of developers and designers passionate about technology and today we are a reference in digital transformation for companies of all sizes.

hero.title: About Digital Hub Agency
hero.subtitle: Transforming ideas into innovative digital solutions since 2018

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2018, Digital Hub Agency was born with the purpose of democratizing access to quality digital solutions. We started as a small team of developers and designers passionate about technology and today we are a reference in digital transformation for companies of all sizes.

mvv.title: Mission, Vision and Values
mvv.missionText: Empower companies through innovative digital solutions that generate real and sustainable results.
mvv.visionText: To be recognized as Brazil's leading digital agency, a reference in innovation and excellence in service.

quotes.first: The team exceeded all our expectations. Our website was delivered on time and with exceptional design that perfectly reflects our brand.
quotes.second: Our online store increased sales by 150% after the redesign and implementation of marketing strategies suggested by the team.
quotes.third: The developed application revolutionized how we communicate with our customers. Intuitive interface and error-free.

chatbots.title: Chatbot Automation: How to Optimize Customer Service
chatbots.subtitle: Learn to implement intelligent virtual assistants to improve customer experience and reduce operational costs.
chatbots.author: Cleyber Silva

section1.title: The Chatbot Revolution
section1.content: Chatbots have evolved from simple auto-responders to sophisticated virtual assistants capable of understanding context, emotions and user intentions.

cost.title: Cost Reduction
cost.description: Up to 70% savings in customer service

chatbots.quote: A well-implemented chatbot can solve 80% of customer queries, freeing the human team for more complex cases.

section3.title: Strategic Implementation
section3.content: The key to success lies in mapping main customer queries, creating natural conversational flows and integrating the chatbot with existing company systems.

pwa.title: The Future of PWAs in 2025
pwa.subtitle: Discover how Progressive Web Apps are revolutionizing mobile and desktop experiences.
pwa.author: Cleyber Silva

section1.title: What are PWAs?
section1.content: Progressive Web Apps are web applications that offer an experience similar to native apps, but with web flexibility and reach.

section2.title: PWA Advantages
section2.content: PWAs offer installation without app stores, automatic updates, offline functionality and superior performance.

pwa.quote: PWAs represent the future of digital applications, combining the best of both worlds: web and mobile.

section3.title: Implementation in 2025
section3.content: With the advancement of web APIs and better browser support, 2025 will be the year of PWA consolidation in the market.
